forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Saturday
